projectSummary: This compiler infrastructure project supports multiple languages and hardware targets including CUDA, ARM, and RISC-V. Recent work delivers new GPU offloading capabilities for NVIDIA hardware, Fortran frontend hardening for complex memory scenarios, and C++20 static analysis enhancements. Sustained activity across frontends, middle-end optimizations, and architecture-specific backends demonstrates healthy, continuous development.

commits.author: banach-space
commits.before: AArch64 builtin argument handling required redundant manual immediate extraction steps.
commits.added: Refactored ARM NEON immediate argument processing into unified validation paths.
commits.impact: Reduced complexity for future ARM builtin maintenance and extensions.
commits.message: [clang][ARM] Refactor argument handling in `EmitAArch64BuiltinExpr` (2/2) (NFC) (#181974)

commits.author: aviralg
commits.before: All SSAF JSON serialization tests lived in a single monolithic file without shared fixtures.
commits.added: Dedicated JSONFormatTest directory with reusable fixture header for modular test organization.
commits.impact: Enables additional SSAF JSON tests to reuse common setup infrastructure.
commits.message: [clang][ssaf] Refactor `JSONFormatTest` into a directory with a shared fixture header (#182523)

commits.author: Jason-Van-Beusekom
commits.before: Math-to-NVVM conversion logic was embedded within the GPUToNVVM pass infrastructure.
commits.added: New standalone MathToNVVM conversion pass separating math dialect lowering from GPU conversions.
commits.impact: Enables independent math-to-CUDA libdevice lowering without GPU dialect dependencies.
commits.message: [NVVM][MLIR] Refactor conversion of Math / Arith Operations seperate Passes (#180058)

commits.author: fhahn
commits.before: FindLast epilogue vectorization with wrapping IV lacked test coverage.
commits.added: Added test for FindIV reduction epilogue behavior without sentinel values.
commits.impact: Documents unsupported paths to prevent invalid epilogue generation.
commits.message: [LV] Add epilogue test with FindLast reduction of wrapping IV.

commits.author: tmjbios
commits.before: Optional assumed-length character dummy arguments caused null pointer crashes during code generation.
commits.added: Added `isa_and_nonnull` null check for size values lacking defining operations in allocation lowering.
commits.impact: Enables crash-free compilation of Fortran with optional assumed-length character dummy arguments.
commits.message: [flang] OPTIONAL char dummy has no defining op; add null check (#182582)

commits.author: rupprecht
commits.before: MathToNVVM conversion unavailable in Bazel builds.
commits.added: Added MathToNVVM library target and wired dependencies.
commits.impact: Enables Math-to-NVVM lowering for NVIDIA GPU compilation.
commits.message: [bazel][NVVM][MLIR] Port 7d9b863bc39f690c6f7716dd27d24e6ccfcfae33 (#182588)

commits.author: RiverDave
commits.before: CUDA device stubs in CIR lacked kernel name metadata for host compilation.
commits.added: New CUDAKernelNameAttr attaches kernel names to CUDA device stubs in CIR.
commits.impact: Enables kernel name propagation through CIR for CUDA runtime launch.
commits.message: [CIR][CUDA] Add CUDAKernelNameAttr for device stubs (#180051)

commits.author: amehsan
commits.before: collectFusionCandidates carried verbose debug instrumentation in its adjacency check loop.
commits.added: Removed debug logging from loop fusion candidate collection to simplify control flow.
commits.impact: Enables cleaner code maintenance and faster debug builds.
commits.message: [LoopFusion] Improve collectFusionCandidates() (#182571)

commits.author: SusanTan
commits.before: ArrayCoorOp with block argument bases survived via shortcut conversion.
commits.added: Arithmetic index computation replaces shortcut for block argument ArrayCoorOp.
commits.impact: Enables erasure of ArrayCoorOp when used only by load/store operations.
commits.message: Reapply "[flang] Lowering a ArrayCoorOp to arithmetic computations" (#182585)

commits.author: jhuber6
commits.before: GPU runtime only supported list-directed output without format specifiers.
commits.added: Formatted I/O support for GPU offloading via RPC interface.
commits.impact: Enables formatted WRITE statements in OpenMP target regions.
commits.message: [flang-rt] Add support for formatted I/O on the GPU (#182580)

commits.author: jhuber6
commits.before: RPC string and memory operations lacked validation for null inputs.
commits.added: Null pointer guards in RPC dispatch and conditional memory copy execution.
commits.impact: Enables safe processing of null handles and zero-length buffers in RPC.
commits.message: [libc] Properly handle null handles in rpc_dispatch.h

commits.author: srpande
commits.before: AMDGPU components used inline ternary checks to determine architectural VGPR counts.
commits.added: New `getAddressableNumArchVGPRs()` method centralizes architectural VGPR count retrieval.
commits.impact: Removes FIXME comments and reduces duplication in AMDGPU register handling.
commits.message: [AMDGPU] Efficient way to get NumArchVGPRs. (#182537)

commits.author: AmrDeveloper
commits.before: Complex DivOp folding proceeded without verifying FastMath flag constraints.
commits.added: Complex DivOp folding now checks FastMath flags before optimizing NaN divisions.
commits.impact: Ensures NaN optimizations respect strict floating-point compilation settings.
commits.message: [MLIR][Complex] Check for FastMathFlag in DivOp folder (#176249)

commits.author: timsmith78
commits.before: Debug metadata omitted pure, elemental, and recursive Fortran procedure attributes.
commits.added: Fortran compiler now emits pure, elemental, and recursive flags in debug info.
commits.impact: Debuggers can distinguish pure, elemental, and recursive functions in Fortran programs.
commits.message: [flang][debug] Supply missing subprogram attributes (#181425)

commits.author: kees
commits.before: `__builtin_counted_by_ref` incorrectly resolved count fields to outer lexical scope for nested structs.
commits.added: Corrected record traversal to stop at named structs while walking through anonymous nesting contexts.
commits.impact: Fixes bounds checking for flexible array members inside nested named struct definitions.
commits.message: [Clang][CodeGen] Fix __builtin_counted_by_ref for nested struct FAMs (#182575) (#182590)

commits.author: fhahn
commits.before: FindLast IV optimizations were limited to loops with sentinel values.
commits.added: Optimization for FindLast induction variables without sentinel values.
commits.impact: Enables vectorization of additional last-match search patterns.
commits.message: [VPlan] Optimize FindLast of FindIV w/o sentinel. (#172569)

commits.author: topperc
commits.before: IsAltFmt field used scalar bit type.
commits.added: Converted IsAltFmt declaration to bits<1> type.
commits.impact: Standardizes bit-field encoding in RISC-V pseudo-instructions.
commits.message: [RISCV] Use bits<1> for AltFmt in RISCVVPseudo. (#182581)

commits.author: fmayer
commits.before: FlowSensitive analysis tests lacked mock headers for C++20 coroutines.
commits.added: Added StdCoroutineHeader string and __void_t template alias.
commits.impact: Enables unit testing of FlowSensitive analysis on coroutine-using code.
commits.message: [NFC] [FlowSensitive] Add mock header for coroutines

commits.author: fmayer
commits.before: FlowSensitive StatusOr tests used C++17 compilation standard.
commits.added: Upgraded FlowSensitive StatusOr test suite to C++20 standard.
commits.impact: Enables testing C++20 constructs in StatusOr analysis.
commits.message: [NFCI] [FlowSensitive] [StatusOr] use c++20 for test

commits.author: fmayer
commits.before: FlowSensitive StatusOr analysis lacked test coverage for coroutine co_return scenarios.
commits.added: Test case detecting unchecked StatusOr access within C++20 coroutine co_return control flow.
commits.impact: Validates safety analysis works correctly with coroutine-based asynchronous code patterns.
commits.message: [ùòÄùóΩùóø] initial version
